name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this moment, Lihuangpi Road in Wuhan is crowded with people and very lively.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of October 31, Wuhan Halloween.
The young people at the scene danced hand in hand under the music of the masked man.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of October 31, Lihuangpi Road, Wuhan.
"Kim Jong-un" greeted the citizens who were watching.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 31, someone cosplayed as Baymax on the streets of Central, Hong Kong.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At this moment, Lihuangpi Road, Wuhan.
Someone is cosplaying as a cow and horse worker.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 31, Lihuangpi Road, Wuhan.
A man wearing an executive jacket, cosplaying as Gao Yuliang: "Are you going to send the stray dogs in your village to the Public Security Bureau to be police dogs?"
The police officer nearby just tried to dissuade him and did not embarrass the man.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 31, at the Halloween event in Wuhan, in a joyful atmosphere, local leaders seemed unhappy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 31, Zhuhai’s Halloween event was stopped midway

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 29, a safety warning notice issued within the railway system confirmed that the large-scale delay at Nanjing South Railway Station on the 27th was caused by a collision. The "mechanic on board was lying between the two tracks" and died after failed rescue efforts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 30, Sydney, Australia. At the entrance of the Chinese Consulate in Sydney, someone posted a poster questioning why the Beijing government is afraid of Halloween.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 30, Sichuan. A netizen posted that the Huawei mate60por he bought this year suddenly exploded and caught fire in his pocket, causing burns to his body and clothes.
Huawei after-sales service said that it was caused by the consumer himself and no compensation would be given. "Supporting domestic products is such a result"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the 30th, US First Lady Jill Biden wore a panda costume and distributed candy and books to children at the White House Halloween event with President Biden. This caused dissatisfaction and boycott among netizens.
Netizens responded: This is an insult to our giant pandas.
"Don't defile the pandas!"
"You are laughing at the scene, while the children in Gaza are crying"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 28, Beijing. A financial blogger summarized recent media reports of ordinary people getting rich through entrepreneurship or work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Russia, a Chinese student posted that when she returned to her rental house, the police blocked her door and fined her. Fortunately, she did not have to pay the fine after the landlord negotiated with her. Later, the police sent her a message to harass her as soon as they left: "You are very charming, can we continue to communicate?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 31, Halloween in Shibuya, Tokyo.
Two men cosplay as Red Guards, holding the national flag and singing "Without the Communist Party, there would be no New China"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 31, in Wuhan, Hubei, the handsome "Batman" rode a chariot on the road. Unfortunately, he was questioned by the police and the chariot was "confiscated" by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 1, Weihai, Shandong. Netizens said they found a piece of meat with hair in the food in the company cafeteria. The restaurant manager said it was from a pig, and some netizens said the hair on the meat looked like hair.
The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 1 (Released) A graffiti on the street in the Georgian capital.
Netizens responded "It's time to throw away this broken shoe"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 1, in Linyi, Shandong, an uncle who looked somewhat like Jiang Zeming was live-streaming on WeChat, during which the system prompted "The host is undergoing safety rectification". In the end, he had no choice but to have his wife do the live-streaming in front of the camera.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Russian soldiers killed their teammates and fled. 
Recently, the media reported that Maxim Fedorchenko, a Russian prisoner recruited from prison by the Russian army, was sent to the Zaporizhia front in Ukraine. After receiving the weapon, he immediately threw a grenade, then killed 10 Russian soldiers with an AK-47 assault rifle in the bunker and escaped.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 1, in response to North Korea's possible military assistance to Russia, the Chinese Foreign Ministry said: 
North Korea and Russia are two independent and sovereign countries. How to develop bilateral relations is their own business.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Be careful.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Brothers, Wolf Warrior is still too conservative"
Recently, major official media reported that a Chinese guy was stopped by the military while riding in Iraq. After showing his Chinese passport, the Iraqi side replaced him with more than a dozen police cars to escort him for 600 miles.
On October 31, the guy posted a video saying "Our group was detained in a Syrian prison for more than 100 hours. I don't want to stay in this country for a moment"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Afghan Taliban issued a new ban on women speaking in public, and women's voices should not be heard in public, including by other women. In addition, the decree also reiterated that girls are prohibited from receiving education beyond primary school and restrict women from working in government agencies and non-governmental organizations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, bloggers have exposed the personal privacy leakage of China Southern Airlines passengers. Tongcheng Travel and other platforms took advantage of the loophole of China Southern Airlines to directly log in to other users' China Southern Airlines APP, add the user's personal information as the other party's relatives to buy discounted tickets, and earn the difference.
As more and more viewers learn about the news and verify whether their information has been leaked, the number of cases is still increasing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the relevant videos on Bilibili, many comments and comments expressed support for the Taliban's ban on women speaking in public.
